Posts.Content: My Good friend was told she has breast cancer today. We will know more on Thursday. They took samples, did scans and she was told they are pretty certain it is cancer. She is a single, hard working Mum of 2 children, aged 10 and 12. Hard enough to get you own head around this but how do you tell the kids without scaring them half to death?
Posts.Title: How do you tell the kids you have cancer?

Posts.Content: Hi to all of you amazing people, I just wanted to thank you all for your advice and support, it has been a huge help. I will pass on all to my friend. I wish you all the best Paola x
